name: goaway
description: GoAway is a small reverse proxy written in Go that provides access control and custom HTTP responses. It's designed for small deployments where simplicity and performance are necessary.
features: Reverse Proxy: Route HTTP traffic to backend services with minimal configuration.
Access Control: Restrict access based on IP addresses, headers, or custom rules.
Custom Responses: Define custom HTTP responses for specific routes or conditions.
Lightweight Design: Minimal resource usage written in Go for high performance.
Simple Configuration: Easy setup with straightforward configuration files.
SSL/TLS Support: Terminate SSL connections and proxy to backend services.
Request Logging: Track incoming requests for debugging and monitoring purposes.
Small Deployments: Ideal for personal projects and small-scale infrastructure.
